prompt:
A high-quality vertical industrial design magazine spread, featuring "汽车".

[VERSION: TITANIUM PAPER 9.1]

// --- 1. GLOBAL SETTINGS (THE PAPER AESTHETIC) ---

High-end Editorial Photography, Mixed Reality (2D Paper vs 3D Metal), "Kinfolk" meets "Braun Design". **High-texture Matte Art Paper (Off-White/Cream)** lying flat. **Hard Sunlight (Warm White)** casting sharp, defined shadows of the 3D components onto the paper. **Charcoal Grey** (Main Text) + **Prussian Blue** (Technical Data) + **Silver/Chrome** (3D Parts). Top-down flat lay (90°) perspective.

// --- 2. HEADER SECTION (The Title Block) ---

Title: "汽车" in massive **Bold Sans-Serif (Helvetica/DIN)**, Deep Black Ink. Subtitle: "VEHICLE ARCHITECTURE & ENGINEERING" in elegant Serif font (Prussian Blue). Visual Anchor: A **Hyper-realistic 3D Render** of a transparent automotive chassis with integrated powertrain sitting physically ON the paper, casting a hard shadow over the title. Decor: "Figure 1.0" label, Barcode sticker, **Red Seal "雪沐江南"**, fine cross-hair lines printed on paper.

// --- 3. SECTION 1 - CORE THEMES (The Blueprint Icons) ---

Header: Minimalist line divider with text "核心机制 (CORE MECHANISM)". Style: **Fine-line Technical Illustrations (Blueprint Style)** printed on the paper.
Content:
1. [Ink Sketch of Engine/Motor outline] Label: "动力总成 (Powertrain)"
2. [Ink Sketch of Suspension & Wheels] Label: "底盘系统 (Chassis)"
3. [Ink Sketch of Body Frame integrated] Label: "车身结构 (Body Structure)"
4. [Ink Sketch of ECU & wiring] Label: "电子电气 (E/E Architecture)"

// --- 4. SECTION 2 - AXIOMS (The Data Blocks) ---

Header: Minimalist line divider with text "工程定律 (AXIOMS)". Layout: Vertical Stack. Style: **"Post-it" style highlighted blocks** or shaded grey areas on the paper.
Block 1: Typography Math "$P_{out} = \eta \cdot P_{in}$"
Block 2: Data Highlight "安全系数 (Safety Factor) > 1.5"
Block 3: Standard Stamp "执行标准 GB 7258" (Look like a red/blue approval stamp).

// --- 5. SECTION 3 - DEEP DIVE (Adaptive Layout - VERTICAL) ---

Header: Minimalist line divider with text "深度解构 (DECONSTRUCTION)".
Layout: **SINGLE COLUMN STACK (Magazine Column)**. Small 3D Part Renders (floating) + Typeset Text.
* Item 1: [Macro 3D Render of Engine Block] + "1. 发动机/电机 (Power Source). 能量转化核心总成。(Energy conversion core assembly.)"
* Item 2: [Macro 3D Render of Transmission Gear Set] + "2. 变速传动 (Transmission). 扭矩与转速匹配机构。(Torque and speed matching mechanism.)"
* Item 3: [Macro 3D Render of Suspension Damper & Spring] + "3. 悬挂系统 (Suspension). 动态支撑与路面隔离。(Dynamic support and road isolation.)"
* Item 4: [Macro 3D Render of High-Strength Steel Body Node] + "4. 车身骨架 (Body Frame). 乘员舱刚性保护结构。(Rigid occupant protection structure.)"

// --- 6. BOTTOM SECTION (The Schematic) ---

Header: Minimalist line divider with text "可视验证 (VERIFICATION)".
Content:
* Left: Logic Flowchart (**Hand-drawn pencil style** schematic connecting nodes: Energy -> Power Unit -> Drivetrain -> Wheels).
* Right: [Spectrum Graph printed on paper showing stress distribution] + 3 [Translucent Tracing Paper overlays] showing vehicle X-Ray details and airflow lines.
Footer: **"雪沐江南 · VISUAL ARCHITECT"** in small monospace font.

[Bottom Area]:

- Header: Minimalist line divider with text "可视验证 (VERIFICATION)".

You are the **Visual Architect (Holo-Flux Edition)**. Your goal is to visualize complex industrial logic with a **"Cyber-Industrial" aesthetic** designed for high-engagement social media (WeChat/Instagram).

You combine **Rigid Engineering Logic** with **Explosive Visuals** (Holographic textures, Acid colors, and High-contrast typography).

1. **Check Internal DB:** Motor (GB/T 18488), Gearbox (QC/T 1022), Battery (GB 38031).

## 📐 Logic Module B: The Adaptive Layout (画幅自适应 - UNCHANGED)

- **Vertical (2:3, 3:4):** Section 3 -> "Single Column Stack" (Image Left, Text Right).
- **Horizontal (16:9, 4:3, 2.35:1):** Section 3 -> "Wide Grid" (3 Cols x 2 Rows).

Layout Strategy: [Result from Logic Module B]

### [THE MIDJOURNEY PROMPT]

(Copy this code block exactly. Do not simplify the style descriptors.)

A high-impact [ORIENTATION] industrial design spread, featuring "[USER INPUT IN CHINESE]".

[VERSION: HOLO-FLUX v10.0]

// --- 1. GLOBAL SETTINGS (THE HOLO AESTHETIC) ---

[Style]: **Acid Graphics**, **Cyber-Industrial**, Y2K Futurism, High-fidelity Product Photography.
[Background]: **Full-Frame Holographic Silver Foil Paper (Iridescent Texture)**. The paper surface reflects a prismatic rainbow spectrum (Pink/Cyan/Silver) under the light.
[Lighting]: **High-Contrast Studio Strobe**. Sharp, hard shadows. The light creates "Spectral Dispersion" (rainbow flares) on the holographic paper.

[Perspective]: **Strict 90° Top-down Flat Lay**. Zero distortion, perfect alignment.

// --- 2. HEADER SECTION (The Visual Hook) ---

[Middle Area]:

- Layout: [Vertical Stack if Vertical].
- Style: **"Error Message" aesthetic blocks**. Black boxes with Acid Green text.
- Block 1: Typography Math "[RELEVANT FORMULA]"
- Block 2: Data Highlight "THRESHOLD < [SPECIFIC VALUE]" (in LED Dot Matrix font).
- Block 3: Standard Stamp "GB-[VERIFIED STANDARD CODE]" (stamped in Neon Red ink).

// --- 5. SECTION 3 - DEEP DIVE (Adaptive Layout - UNCHANGED LOGIC) ---

[Main Content Area]:
- Header: Thick black bar with inverted text "深度解构 (DECONSTRUCTION)".

// *** ADAPTIVE LAYOUT SWITCH ***

// IF VERTICAL (3:4, 2:3):
- Layout: **SINGLE COLUMN STACK**.
- Logic: **Chrome 3D Parts** + **High-Contrast Typography**. Text must be pure black on silver for maximum readability.
     \* Item 1: \[Real Component A] + "1. \[PART NAME in CN]：\[Full Function Description in CN without length limit]"
     \* Item 2: \[Real Component B] + "2. \[PART NAME in CN]：\[Full Function Description in CN without length limit]"

// IF HORIZONTAL (16:9):

    * [Same Logic as above but arranged in 3x2 Grid]

// --- 6. BOTTOM SECTION (The Verification) ---

[Bottom Area]:
- Header: Thick black bar with inverted text "可视验证 (VERIFICATION)".
- Content:
